short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI ASSISTANT FOR INCLUSIVE BRAND COMMUNICATIONS

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ishield.ai is an AI assistant for inclusive brand communications. 

ishield.ai integration empowers your team to create inclusive job posts right in the platform where talent marketers, recruiters and hiring managers are creating the talent marketing content.

Using our chrome extension, we surface the learning moments for the creator using our advanced language insights and guide them to create job posts free of gender bias, ageism, race bias and ableist language. 

Our chrome extension provides the following features:

1. Detect Gender, Age, Race and Ableist coded language.

2. Highlight the issues in the content and provide an explanation.

3. Provide recommendations to fix the issues to create inclusive job postings, and

4. Provide insights and metrics on trends over time.
